summary: Provides utility classes and helper functions for installing Conan configuration files from various sources (local paths, compressed archives, git repositories) into the Conan configuration area, handling ignore patterns, password masking, temporary directories, and tracking the origin of each configuration value. Most functions are currently placeholders without active usage.
business_intent: Facilitate automated or userâ€‘driven deployment of Conan configuration settings from external sources while ensuring proper file selection, security of sensitive values, and traceability of configuration origins.
